education.degree: BFA in Interactive Media (now known as Interactive Arts)

description: I’m a front-end developer and manager who loves exploring, learning, and perfecting my craft. I’ve been lucky to work with and mentor teams of people who share the same passion. My technical expertise started with the core of HTML, CSS, and Javascript but has expanded over time to the broader tasks of how projects are structured, how to develop code for ease of understanding and modularity, and even to devops. I enjoy solving the small-scale CSS oddities as much as planning out our largest site deployments. Ultimately my passion is for expanding my knowledge, my capabilities, and the quality of my work. This passion extends past web development into all of my hobbies be it homebrewing, 3D printing, welding, woodworking, or metalworking. There is always more to explore, learn, and share.

jobs.title: Head of Web Development
jobs.description: Since 2016 I’ve led the development team for the Marketing organization within AppDirect. We are responsible for maintaining the fleet of sites to support various go-to-market motions for the company. During my tenure, we’ve grown from a dev team of 2 to 5, a company of 80 to over 500 employees, and redesigned and deployed AppDirect.com 4 times as our needs and goals changed.
